item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, November 27, 2024 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Malware can turn off webcam LED and record video, demonstrated on ThinkPad X230 (108 points | 80 comments)
2. You can use C-Reduce for any language (174 points | 33 comments)
3. Show HN: Feels Like Paper (80 points | 25 comments)
4. Show HN: App that asks ‘why?’ every time you unlock your phone (573 points | 295 comments)
5. Matomo-org/device-detector: Universal Device Detection library from User Agent (8 points | discuss)
6. The US copyright office has struck down a major effort for game preservation (58 points | 43 comments)
7. Microsoft is first to get HBM-juiced AMD CPUs (38 points | 26 comments)
8. Chebyshev Polynomials in the 16th Century (2022) (64 points | 22 comments)
9. The capacitor that Apple soldered incorrectly at the factory (416 points | 167 comments)
10. Psychoacoustic and archeoacoustic nature of ancient Aztec skull whistles (15 points | 4 comments)
11. Ancient Sumerians created the first writing system (99 points | 115 comments)
12. The Art and Mathematics of Genji-Ko (79 points | 3 comments)
13. Show HN: AutoPiP – Safari extension for automatic Picture-in-Picture mode (29 points | 11 comments)
14. Show HN: TeaTime – distributed book library powered by SQLite, IPFS and GitHub (14 points | 7 comments)
15. Publishers Have Said the Quiet Part Out Loud About Retro Games (38 points | 27 comments)
16. Launch HN: Keep (YC W23) – AIOps and alert management (65 points | 23 comments)
17. How Blackjack Works (2007) (33 points | 11 comments)
18. Prelude to McCarthyism: The Making of a Blacklist (2006) (40 points | 32 comments)
19. Brain learning differs fundamentally from artificial intelligence systems (31 points | 8 comments)
20. Ultra-low-latency, batching and concurrent queue for IPC in Java (4 points | discuss)
21. Python type hints may not be not for me in practice (39 points | 47 comments)
22. Google Rules of Machine Learning (16 points | 3 comments)
23. Malaria vaccine delivered by a mosquito bite (61 points | 135 comments)
24. Janet for Mortals (2023) (208 points | 56 comments)
25. Comparing AWS S3 with Cloudflare R2: Price, Performance and User Experience (138 points | 87 comments)
26. Emacs arbitrary code execution and how to avoid it (115 points | 91 comments)
27. A Deep Dive into DDPMs (10 points | 1 comment)
28. Martha's Vineyard Sign Language (39 points | 5 comments)
29. Hacker in Snowflake extortions may be a U.S. soldier (321 points | 179 comments)
30. Memento Movi (28 points | 11 comments)
